message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with exceptional features and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and capabilities, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $15000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the value it brings. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and benefits you've highlighted. Can you consider this offer?
